seasons.title: Wrath of Grapes: The Don Cherry Story II

episodes.synopsis: Recently fired from his role as Colorado Rockies' coach, Don Cherry scores a new job as host of a popular sports TV talk show, Coach's Corner.
episodes.title: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The final chapter of his story paints a portrait of events and people central to the former hockey coach's TV persona and status as a sports legend.
episodes.title: Part 2

video.title: Wrath of Grapes: The Don Cherry Story II
video.synopsis: This follow-up story to Don Cherry's early career reveals his enduring foothold as a sports icon and his rise to prominence as a media personality.
